comment: Nice guy. Cares about the student.  Enjoyed his class.
Life experience is great but that's all this guy talks about. I don't think he realizes there is life outside himself and his experiences.

He talks about his personal life all of the time. He is very egocentric. You learn more about his mishaps than about the material. I think he needs friends and tries to make them in the classroom. Very unprofessional. Maybe he should coach instead.
